column4: it all started when i was installing ubuntu linux 4.1 and then deleted it after it didnt work beside windows os and then a guy named vadar helped me to delete grub that wasnt letting me boot to windows because of an error 22 then wheni try to boot it says hal.dll needs to be reinstalled or some thing how can i reinstall it with out an os the only way i can use my computer is with this ubuntu live cd
boot with your windowsxp cd and use repair option
